posts.title: Screenshot shortcut
posts.description: By pressing Command + Shift + 4, you can crop out a specific screen and screenshot it that section.

posts.title: Toothpick stand
posts.description: By breaking off the end of the toothpick, you can put the toothpick on it to avoid touching the dirty table.

posts.title: Bleach is toxic when consumed
posts.description: Two people have died last year from consuming bleach.

posts.title: Toothpaste gets rid of stains
posts.description: If you get a food stain on your shirt, you can rub toothpaste and make it disappear.
